description: Dive into the immersive world of retail management with Ultimate Fishing Supermarket Simulator 3D! Step into the shoes of a savvy entrepreneur and become the proud owner of a bustling fishing shop. Cater to the needs of passionate anglers as you stock your store with an extensive array of fishing gear, equipment, and accessories. Key Features: Manage Your Store: Run your very own fishing supermarket, buying goods at competitive prices and selling them for a profit. Upgrade and Expand: Use your profits to upgrade your store, expand your inventory, and attract more customers. Realistic 3D Environment: Experience a detailed and immersive 3D world that brings your fishing supermarket to life. Strategic Planning: Balance supply and demand to maximize your profits and grow your business empire. Customer Satisfaction: Keep your customers happy with a diverse range of high-quality products and exceptional service. Whether you're a fan of fishing or just love business simulation games, Ultimate Fishing Supermarket Simulator 3D offers a unique and engaging experience that will keep you hooked for hours. Start your journey as a fishing market tycoon and reel in the profits today!
Title: Ultimate Fishing Supermarket Simulator 3D

description: From games studio A44, makers of Ashen, comes an explosive Souls-lite, where Gods and guns collide in a battle for the future of humanity. The Door to the Great Below has been opened unleashing the Gods and their armies of the Dead. The lands of Kian are besieged, the city of Dawn is on the brink of destruction. It’s time for the Coalition army to fight back. Embrace vengeance, gunpowder and magic as you embark on an epic journey to defeat the Gods, close the door and retake the world. Your battle begins now. Kill. All. Gods. A Unique Companionship Step into the boots of Nor Vanek, an elite member of the Coalition army, joined by Enki, a mysterious fox-like companion, in their quest for vengeance against the Gods. Guided by Enki who shares his knowledge of the world with you, your combat skills and traversal capabilities will be imbued with his magical powers making you a duo to be reckoned with. An explosive souls-lite Flintlock retains elements of the souls-like genre and infuses it with rapid mobility resulting in dynamic and explosive combat. Weave in melee, gunpowder and magic in rhythmic battles where combos chain together to create a deadly dance. Use Nor's gunpowder abilities to exploit verticality to your advantage and deal death from above, or quickly recover from danger. A world scarred by the Gods Unleashed upon the world, the vengeful Gods are on a rampage, intent on causing chaos and the downfall of mankind. Traverse the ravaged landscape of Kian, utilizing Enki's magic and portals to soar through the skies while confronting hordes of the undead. Discover new equipment, strengthen your weapons, and upgrade your gear in anticipation of the ultimate showdown against the Gods.
Title: Flintlock: The Siege of Dawn

description: Get Darkest Dungeon II and The Binding Blade DLC together for a discount! This product entitles you to download both the digital PS4â„¢ version and the digital PS5â„¢ version of this game.
Title: Darkest Dungeon II: Oblivion Edition

description: Darkest Dungeon II is a roguelike road trip of the damned. Form a party, equip your stagecoach, and set off across the decaying landscape on a last gasp quest to avert the apocalypse. The greatest dangers you face, however, may come from within... Gather your courage and ride out into the chaos of a world undone. Four heroes and a stagecoach are all that stand between darkness and salvation. Roguelike Runs; Even Failure Moves You Forward Each expedition is less than 5 hours, and progress you make opens up new hero abilities, items, and stagecoach upgrades that can be used on your next journey. The Affinity System As travels progress, heroes bond with each other or grate on each others’ nerves, leading to desperately needed combat synergies or journey-ending dysfunction. Manage their stress and interaction to keep the team together until the bitter end. Face Your Failures Uncover and experience the tragic origin stories of each hero and unlock their full potential. Nightmarish Environs From the burning Sprawl to the diseased Foetor, the road will challenge your strategies and your endurance. And more... Rest your weary, shell-shocked heroes at the Inn, where you can manage their stress and relationships with a variety of diversions and delights. Uncover and experience the tragic origin stories of the heroes. A stylish and dynamic evolution of Darkest Dungeon’s signature art style. A return of the narration system and voice actor Wayne June! Exciting improvements to the turn-based combat from Darkest Dungeon. This product entitles you to download both the digital PS4â„¢ version and the digital PS5â„¢ version of this game.
Title: Darkest Dungeon II

description: Step into the vibrant world of Anime Girls - MMA Tournament, where the thrill of mixed martial arts collides with the enchanting allure of anime aesthetics. This 3D fighting simulator invites you to join a dynamic roster of anime girl fighters, each with their own unique skills, fighting styles, and captivating personalities. In Anime Girls - MMA Tournament, you will participate in a series of exhilarating championships, each designed to test your strategic thinking, reflexes, and combat prowess. Engage in fast-paced, action-packed battles in beautifully rendered arenas that bring the anime world to life. Every victory in the ring brings you closer to becoming the ultimate MMA champion. Earn money with each win and invest in your fighters to enhance their abilities. Upgrade their strength, speed, agility, and special moves to create the most formidable fighters in the tournament. As you progress, unlock new characters with diverse fighting techniques, adding depth and excitement to your roster. Explore a richly detailed anime universe filled with vibrant characters and immersive storylines. Customize your fighters' appearances and gear to reflect your personal style and preferences. Whether you're a casual player or a seasoned fighter, Anime Girls - MMA Tournament offers a compelling and rewarding experience. Dive into the competitive world of MMA, where only the strongest and most skilled fighters will rise to the top. Can you lead your favorite anime girl to victory and become the reigning champion of the Anime Girls - MMA Tournament? The fight begins now!
Title: Anime Girls - MMA Tournament

description: Welcome to the untamed frontier! In "Wild West Tycoon Empire," you are tasked with transforming the rugged Wild West into a thriving economic powerhouse. This low-poly style simulation game invites you to master the art of frontier entrepreneurship where every decision counts and every enterprise takes you one step closer to building a legendary empire. Features: Frontier Agriculture: Cultivate a variety of Wild West crops such as Prairie Corn, Frontier Beans, and Pioneer Pumpkins. Each plant has unique requirements and benefits, challenging you to adapt and innovate farming techniques suitable for the Wild West. Town Building: Design and develop your own Wild West town from the ground up. Construct essential structures like saloons, general stores, and stables to ensure your town's growth and prosperity. Resource Management: Carefully manage limited resources such as water, timber, and gold. Make critical decisions to balance resource consumption with town expansion and efficiency. Research and Development: Unlock advanced technologies through research to improve your farming and building capabilities. Experiment with innovative irrigation systems and durable building materials to thrive in the harsh conditions of the Wild West. Survival Challenges: Face the realities of Wild West life, including droughts, dust storms, and bandit raids, which can threaten your crops and town's survival. Dynamic weather and event systems require quick thinking and robust contingency planning. Stunning Low-Poly Graphics: Enjoy a visually striking low-poly art style that brings the beauty and roughness of the Wild West to life. The simplistic yet captivating graphics make building your empire a truly enchanting experience. Embark on a unique entrepreneurial journey with "Wild West Tycoon Empire." Can you tame the wild frontier and build a new home for settlers?
Title: Wild West Tycoon

description: Join the world of BioStorm - a futuristic online third-person shooter where events unfold in an exciting and dangerous warehouse of biologically active substances. Players will plunge into an atmosphere of incredible technology and frantic battles, where every action can decide the fate of the entire operation. Bio-Arsenal of Death: From exploding grenades to powerful rifles, your arsenal in BioStorm consists of the deadliest and most advanced weapons. Feel the power of modified projectiles for maximum damage. Team Operations and PvP Battles: Join a team of your friends or engage in one-on-one combat with other players. BioStorm offers a variety of modes and epic battles
Title: BioStorm

description: Gas Station Simulator is all about renovating, expanding and running a gas station along a highway in the middle of a desert. Freedom of choice and multiple approaches to run your business and deal with pressure are key ingredients in this game. Buy an abandoned gas station in the middle of nowhere and restore it to its former glory. Get rid of debris and broken furniture, fix up the walls, paint and decorate the place to your liking. Just don’t spend all your cash on the looks right away, you bought a gas station after all. Repair the equipment, buy what can’t be repaired and start serving your customers to earn money for further renovations and improvements. Can Touch This DLC Rebuild & Reconstruct! Take matters into your own hand. Almost literally. With the help of your new, trusty hammer, it's time to redecorate like you've never done before. Refurbish walls to your heart's content, changing their features and decor as you see fit. Decide where to put trash cans or where to move the cash register to. Direct the crowd. Show your customers the right way to orderly queue without taking too much space. It's time to take interior customisation to a completely new level. Paint & Spray! No need to stare at an empty canvas any longer! Grab your spray can and add a little personal touch to any surface you can lay your hands on. With adjustable scale and rotation, you can spray anything from large murals to tiny easter eggs hidden somewhere in the corners of your station. Combine existing decals with each other, creating even more elaborate and complex pieces of art. And whenever you start feeling like you're running out, more designs lie hidden all around for you to unlock! Warehouse & Workshop Did you ever feel like your station was missing something? That flair didn't quite measure up to par when looking beyond your main building? Have no fear for the future is here. From tables to desks to banners and lights, your Warehouse and Workshop now possess a full suite of purchasable customisations! Make the diamond in the sand shine even brighter than before. Airstrip DLC Meet Joe Joe is an old pilot flying an old single engine plane. He is a bit strange and one day approaches you to help him with his endeavours. For that he needs a place to land in the middle of nowhere to make a stop halfway to his destination. In return he is willing to cut you in on his deals. The Airstrip You have plenty of space and as it turned out, there used to be an old military landing strip during WWII close to your gas station. Should be that hard to make it work again, right? You might even go a step further, order some aviation fuel and some parts for planes. A windsock wouldn’t probably hurt and some lights might turn out to be useful, since you will on occasion also need to help him land. Let’s see how things develop and what Joe is up to... The Plane Joe’s plane is like its pilot: old. It’s also simple. The most advanced technology on this thing is the LED reading light Joe uses to find his way on the chart. How hard can it be to fix some simple things on a small plane? And it’s not like you are doing it for free. The Gameplay The Airstrip DLC brings new game mechanics and content to Gas Station Simulator based on events. Unlike the content we introduced in the past, it does not require your constant attention, it is more something that happens every now and then.
Title: Gas Station Simulator, Airstrip DLC and Can Touch This DLC Bundle

description: Step into the bustling world of retail management with Supermarket Manager Simulator Empire 2024, a vibrant and engaging 3D market simulator. As the proud owner of your very own supermarket, your mission is to transform a humble store into a thriving retail empire! In this cartoon-styled adventure, you’ll have the freedom to upgrade every aspect of your supermarket. Expand your aisles, enhance your displays, and stock a diverse range of products to keep your customers satisfied and your profits soaring. From fresh produce to the latest gadgets, the choices are endless, and the power is in your hands. Key Features: Dynamic Upgrades: Continuously improve your supermarket with exciting upgrades that attract more customers and boost your revenue. Diverse Product Range: Buy and sell a wide variety of products, each with its own unique appeal and profit margins. Cartoon-Style Graphics: Enjoy a charming and whimsical visual experience that makes managing your supermarket fun and visually appealing. Strategic Management: Make savvy business decisions, manage your finances, and outsmart the competition to build the ultimate retail empire. Whether you're a strategic mastermind or just love the hustle and bustle of a busy market, Supermarket Manager Simulator Empire 2024 offers endless hours of fun and challenge. Are you ready to build your supermarket empire?
Title: Supermarket Manager Simulator Empire 2024

description: Spin Rhythm XD is a kinetic rhythm action game with smooth controls, hand-crafted levels and beautiful, reactive backgrounds. A homage to classic arcade rhythm games (Guitar Hero, DDR), with a modern aesthetic and soundtrack. Match colours and beats, spin, tap, flick and flow through the juiciest beats in the universe. For the first time ever Spin Rhythm XD features an optional (and completely free!) VR mode. This allows PlayStationÂ®VR2 players to feel closer to the music than ever before with the smoothest motion controls we have ever been able to deliver. Featuring over 60 licensed and original tracks by Hyper Potions, Nitro Fun, Haywyre, Au5, Camellia, Anamanaguchi, Panda Eyes, Teminite, Pegboard Nerds, Akira Complex, Tokyo Machine, meganeko, Anomalie, Lena Raine, 2Mello, Moe Shop and more.
Title: Spin Rhythm XD

description: Contains Spin Rhythm XD game, Monstercat DLC, Chillhop DLC and Supporter Pack
Title: Spin Rhythm XD Deluxe Edition

description: Mother's Day Journey is a delightful puzzle game designed to celebrate the enchanting atmosphere of Mother's Day. Flip Mother's Day themed cards to uncover matching pairs. The game offers four different difficulty levels: Easy, Medium, Hard, and Expert. Each level challenges players' memory and attention skills while immersing them in the joyous holiday spirit with adorable Mother's Day characters and atmospheric music. Mother's Day Journey, with its four distinct difficulty levels, adds an extra layer of joy to your Mother's Day celebrations!
Title: Mother's Day Journey
Publisher: ERIK GAMES YAZILIM OYUN TEKNOLOJILERI TICARET ANONIM SIRKETI

description: Dive into the heart of the Summer Games Tournament with this Beach Volley game Experience the thrill of competition as you vie for the coveted gold medal in intense beach volleyball matches. Our game delivers a true-to-life experience with full 3D graphics, smooth animations, and realistic beach volleyball sound effects, ensuring every spike and dive feels authentic and immersive. Compete solo against AI challengers or gather your friends for exhilarating local multiplayer matches for up to 4 players. Whether you're serving up aces or executing precise blocks, every move counts as you strive to dominate the sandy court and claim victory. "Summer Games Beach Volley" is the perfect blend of excitement and precision, offering players a chance to showcase their skills in the ultimate test of beach volleyball prowess. Are you ready to step onto the sand, face off against the competition, and seize the gold medal in the Summer Games Tournament?
Title: Summer Games Beach Volley
Publisher: Benoit Varasse trading as Pix Arts

description: Dive into the heart of the Summer Games Tournament with this Beach Volley game Experience the thrill of competition as you vie for the coveted gold medal in intense beach volleyball matches. Our game delivers a true-to-life experience with full 3D graphics, smooth animations, and realistic beach volleyball sound effects, ensuring every spike and dive feels authentic and immersive. Compete solo against AI challengers or gather your friends for exhilarating local multiplayer matches for up to 4 players. Whether you're serving up aces or executing precise blocks, every move counts as you strive to dominate the sandy court and claim victory. "Summer Games Beach Volley" is the perfect blend of excitement and precision, offering players a chance to showcase their skills in the ultimate test of beach volleyball prowess. Are you ready to step onto the sand, face off against the competition, and seize the gold medal in the Summer Games Tournament?
Title: Summer Games Beach Volley
Publisher: Benoit Varasse trading as Pix Arts

description: In "Rooftop Rascal: The Alley Cat," you control a clever alley cat navigating city buildings' fire escape stairs to the rooftop goal. The gameplay centres on precise jumps, avoiding (possible) obstacles, and quick thinking. Your goal is to climb as high as you can, reach the rooftop, and beat the game.
Title: Rooftop Rascal: The Alley Cat
Publisher: Christian Marcell de Oliveira trading as chroda

description: Moving Out 2 is the wacky sequel to the world-famous physics-based moving simulator. Working as a solo F.A.R.T, or with up to three friends, slip into your Smooth Moves uniform and help the residents of Packmore, and beyond, to pack up and ship out! The F.A.R.Tastic 4 pack add's 4 keen new movers into the Smooth Moves roster, allowing you to flex those moving muscles with Chum, Bastian, Hootacris and Cera Topps across the all new Packmore and beyond. MULTI-DIMENSIONAL LOCAL & ONLINE MULTIPLAYER Friends who move together, groove together! Whether you fancy some local co-op action or a cross-play online multiplayer session, we’ve got you signed, sealed and delivered! NEW ADVENTURE We’re not in Packmore anymore… Via inter-dimensional portals you will explore new worlds filled with hilariously silly challenges and chaotic, rib-tickling action. FRESH CHARACTERS & RETURNING FAVOURITES Moving Out 2 features an entire new cast of extra lovable characters because Smooth Moves have signed up some new F.A.R.T recruits! Not to worry though, Rye Yu and Sidney are still on the payroll… IT'S FOR EVERYONE! Assist mode?! Check! A wide array of accessibility options?! Check! Loads of characters and countless finely tailored fits and skins for all you fashionistas?! Check! Check! Check!
Title: Moving Out 2 - Deluxe Edition

description: Welcome to Auto Empire: Dealer Car Simulator, the ultimate 3D car dealership experience! Step into the shoes of a savvy car dealer and build your empire from the ground up. Buy old, run-down vehicles, give them a new lease on life with your repair skills, and sell them for a profit. With each successful sale, you’ll have the opportunity to upgrade your dealership, expand your empire, and become the top car dealer in town. Key Features: Realistic Car Trading: Purchase a variety of old cars, each with unique conditions and challenges. Assess the best deals and make strategic decisions to maximize your profits. Detailed Repair Mechanics: Dive into the intricacies of car repair. Replace parts, fix engines, and give each car a fresh look with your expert touch. Upgrade Your Dealership: Use your earnings to expand and upgrade your dealership. Enhance your showroom, hire skilled staff, and attract more customers to grow your business. Dynamic Economy: Experience a realistic market where prices fluctuate. Keep an eye on trends and adjust your buying and selling strategies accordingly. Customization Options: Personalize your cars with a variety of upgrades and visual modifications to increase their value and appeal to potential buyers. Immersive 3D Graphics: Enjoy stunning 3D graphics that bring the world of car dealing to life. From detailed car models to a bustling dealership environment, every aspect is designed for immersion. Engaging Gameplay: Balance your time and resources as you juggle buying, repairing, and selling cars. Strategic planning and quick thinking are key to building a successful empire. Are you ready to turn rusty old cars into gold and build the car dealership empire of your dreams? Jump into Auto Empire: Dealer Car Simulator and start your journey today!
Title: Auto Empire: Dealer Car Simulator

description: Embark on a journey to build and defend your own medieval kingdom in "Knight Sim Life," a captivating 3D farming and city-building simulation game. Set in a vibrant low-poly world, players assume the role of a valiant knight tasked with cultivating the land, constructing magnificent structures, and safeguarding their burgeoning realm from looming threats. Features: Dynamic City Building: Construct and customize your medieval city from the ground up. Erect majestic castles, bustling markets, quaint cottages, and essential infrastructure to support your growing population. Lavish Farming Mechanics: Delve into the art of agriculture as you cultivate vast fields of crops, orchards, and livestock. Harvest resources, manage livestock, and master the seasons to ensure prosperity for your people. Thriving Economy: Establish trade routes, negotiate with merchants, and manage your kingdom's economy to foster prosperity and growth. Trade resources, goods, and artifacts with neighboring realms to strengthen alliances and expand your influence. Rich Narrative: Immerse yourself in a captivating storyline filled with quests, challenges, and unexpected encounters. Unravel the mysteries of the realm, forge alliances with other knights, and shape the fate of your kingdom through your actions. Immersive Visuals: Experience the charm of a medieval fantasy world brought to life with stunning low-poly graphics, vibrant environments, and intricate details that capture the essence of a bygone era. Endless Exploration: Venture beyond the walls of your city to discover hidden treasures, ancient ruins, and untamed wilderness teeming with adventure. Explore diverse biomes, encounter mythical creatures, and uncover the secrets of the land. "Knight Sim Life" offers a compelling blend of city-building, farming simulation, and strategic combat, inviting players to embark on an epic journey of discovery, conquest, and heroism in a richly detailed medieval world.
Title: Knight Sim Life

description: The story takes place in an old stronghold, at the last days of a great battle. You died, but your will was stronger than your body, so you woke up again, to continue the siege in a never-ending night. Remembering little more than your purpose, you'll have to leave the dungeons, advance through the stronghold's outskirts, and reach the highest tower. To find the Heir and finally end your curse. Â· Explore Non-linear map where you'll be unlocking access to new places once you have acquired special items or abilities within the game. Â· Fight your way in Fast paced combat focused on skill, where every enemy is different from the others and even the more harmless looking one can be deadly. With three difficulty modes, you can adapt the game to your own tastes, in case you want a challenge or you are just in for the adventure. Â· Equip yourself Multiple weapons with very different movesets that completely change the gameplay, and the way you face the different challenges of the game. Â· Learn secrets Meet different characters that, as you, woke up with a blurry purpose to follow and discover their stories.
Title: Last Night of Winter

description: On the anniversary of the Jupiter disaster, an alien signal transmits construction blueprints for an alien craft, which humanity builds, called Exo One. An alien craft… Master a truly alien traversal system and move through enigmatic and desolate alien landscapes in ways you've never experienced. Control gravity itself and build momentum to reach colossal speeds and exhilarating heights. An interplanetary journey Ride thermal updrafts into boiling cloud formations, careen down hillsides and launch off mountain tops, all the time drifting toward the shining blue beam on the horizon. Atmospheric, diffused visuals are merged with otherworldly sound effects and a hypnotic electric guitar soundtrack. Pilot your craft on mankind's first voyage outside the solar system, and go on an interplanetary journey across space and time.
Title: Exo One

description: Take to the skies in "Drone Delivery Simulator," a thrilling single-player game where you start as a humble pizza delivery pilot and rise to master a variety of complex delivery missions. Navigate a detailed map with your evolving drone fleet, facing diverse challenges and environments. Key Features: - Progressive Delivery Missions: Start with pizza deliveries and unlock more advanced tasks. - Single Expansive Map: Explore different areas, from urban landscapes to suburban settings. - Customizable Drone Fleet: Upgrade from basic models to advanced drones for varied missions. - Realistic Controls and Physics: Master skillful flying in changing weather and environments. - Strategic Gameplay: Plan efficient routes to meet diverse delivery deadlines. - Continuous Challenge: Adapt to increasing difficulty and varied package requirements. Embark on a unique drone delivery adventure and transform your piloting skills into a flourishing delivery service.
Title: Drone Delivery Simulator

description: Welcome to City Bus Simulator, the ultimate 3D bus simulation game that puts you in the driver's seat of a city bus! Experience the thrill of navigating the bustling streets, completing challenging missions, and becoming the best bus driver in the city. Immerse Yourself in Realistic Bus Driving City Bus Simulator offers a highly realistic driving experience with meticulously detailed 3D graphics that bring the city to life. Feel the rush of driving through busy urban streets, dealing with traffic, and maneuvering through tight spots. With dynamic weather conditions and a day-night cycle, every drive is a new adventure. Diverse and Engaging Missions Take on a variety of exciting missions that test your driving and time management skills. Whether you're parking with precision, transporting passengers from one location to another, or meeting tight deadlines, each mission offers a unique challenge. Your goal is to complete these missions successfully to earn money and unlock new opportunities. Earn Money and Upgrade Your Fleet Every successful mission rewards you with money that you can use to upgrade your bus fleet. Buy more powerful and faster buses, each with unique designs and capabilities. From standard city buses to luxury coaches, choose the right bus for the mission at hand and enhance your driving experience. Key Features: Realistic Bus Driving Experience: Drive through beautifully designed cityscapes with realistic traffic patterns and pedestrian interactions. Wide Range of Missions: Enjoy a variety of mission types including parking challenges, passenger transportation, and time-based tasks. Dynamic Weather and Day-Night Cycle: Experience changing weather conditions and a realistic day-night cycle that affects your driving conditions. Bus Upgrades and Customization: Use your earnings to purchase and upgrade buses. Customize your buses to improve performance and style. Intuitive Controls: Easy-to-use controls provide a smooth driving experience for players of all skill levels. Immersive 3D Graphics: High-quality 3D graphics create an immersive and visually stunning world. Realistic Sounds and Effects: Authentic bus sounds and environmental effects enhance the realism of the game. Who Can Play? City Bus Simulator is designed for simulation game enthusiasts, driving fans, and anyone who loves a good challenge. It's suitable for players of all ages, offering an enjoyable and educational experience for younger players and a satisfying challenge for adults.
Title: City Bus Simulator

description: Platforming adventure gets a survival twist in Go Go Jump!!! Take on all the Jump masters as you earn badges in Story mode or compete in various survival scenarios against your friends. Go Go Jump!!! is a side-scrolling action extravaganza presented in a mix of 3D environments, hand-drawn HD sprites and fully voiced hilarity. Join Dylan the Dog and a motley cast of anthropomorphic combatants as you dodge and jump your way to victory. Controls are simple so anyone can play. Just move left or right and jump, but dodging every obstacle that comes your way will be easier said than done. Take on 90 unique challenges or test your skills in Boss Rush mode! Features: • Move left or right and jump to survive each stage! • Follow a wacky story starring Dylan the Dog. • Master 90 unique challenges! • Enjoy colorfully animated cel-shaded presentation with full voiceovers. • Put your jumping skills to the ultimate test in Boss Rush mode. This product entitles you to download both the digital PS4Â® version and the digital PS5Â® version of this game.
Title: Go Go Jump!!!

description: Frogun ENCORE is a dashing standalone expansion/sequel to indie hit FROGUN! Explore the world with your trusty Frogun in this cute, lowpoly adventure! Three whole years have passed since Renata defeated Beelzebub, and her small vacation in Jake's town is cut short when the fly bois attack again! It seems one of Beelzebub's loyal followers has an evil scheme in motion to bring him back, and Renata, Jake and Hatter will have to travel the whole world to foil his plans. Join Renata on a brand new FROGUN adventure in this fast-paced classic 3D platformer! Building off of the original gameplay, FROGUN Encore features a slew of new movements, like the double jump, sling catapult and toss jump! Plus, experience FROGUN in true couch co-op. Have Jake pop in at any time to explore together the perilous ruins! As Renata (and Jake!) navigate the world in all new environments, collect notes and all sorts of treasure and retrieve all fly emblems. Features: -Explore colorful levels as you trek across the world - explore whimsical areas and environments in stylish lowpoly aesthetic -Expanded fluid movement ; jump, double jump, swing on ledges and poles, grapple, and use your trusty Frogun to navigate the environment in new, unique ways! -Fight big bosses -Find secret areas or shortcuts by mastering advanced jumping & grappling mechanics! How nimble are you? -Collect emblems by fulfilling level challenges, and discover the stories of other adventurers through hidden diary notes -Unlock hats for your characters and show off your swag! -A poseable photo mode to let you show off your creativity! -True Co-Op; play with your best friend and cooperate or race together towards the end of each level! This product entitles you to download both the digital PS4Â® version and the digital PS5Â® version of this game. If you already own the PS4Â® version of this game, you can get the PS5Â® digital version at no extra cost and you do not need to purchase this product. Owners of a PS4Â® disc copy must insert it into the PS5Â® every time they want to download or play the PS5Â® digital version. PS4Â® game disc owners who buy the PS5Â® Digital Edition disc-free console will not be able to get the PS5Â® version at no extra cost.
Title: Frogun Encore

description: Step into the shadowy world of high-stakes theft with "Thief Simulator: Heist Master," a cutting-edge 3D simulator that puts you in the shoes of a master thief. Plan and execute the perfect heist as you steal vehicles, crack safes, and make away with valuable treasures. In this immersive experience, every heist is a thrilling puzzle waiting to be solved. Use your ill-gotten gains to purchase advanced tools and gadgets, enhancing your skills and unlocking new, more lucrative targets. With each successful job, you'll inch closer to becoming the ultimate heist master. Key Features: Realistic 3D Environments: Navigate through beautifully rendered environments that react to your every move. Advanced Heist Mechanics: Utilize a variety of tools and techniques to disable security systems, crack safes, and bypass locks. Dynamic Vehicle Theft: Steal an array of vehicles, from everyday cars to high-end supercars, each with their own unique challenges. Progressive Skill Development: Invest your earnings in new equipment and upgrades, enhancing your abilities and opening up new opportunities. Engaging Gameplay: Combine stealth, strategy, and quick thinking to outsmart security measures and complete increasingly complex heists. Are you ready to embrace the life of a master thief? Hone your skills, gather your gear, and step into the thrilling world of "Thief Simulator: Heist Master" today!
Title: Thief Simulator: Heist Master

description: This product entitles you to download both the digital PS4Â® version and the digital PS5Â® version of this game. A faithful priest of the Orthogonal order–exiled unto death for a crime in defense of another–you live again in a small boat, adrift in a swamp. A stranger ferries you to solid ground and bestows upon you a cryptic warning, along with a mysterious staff and book. Go forth, pious priest, alleviate suffering, uncover deceptions, and smash the eldritch perversions encroaching upon reality itself. Perhaps you will even earn your peace. A marriage between modern development tools and techniques with a stark late 90s aesthetic brings the first person action-adventure GRAVEN to life! Featuring character designs by Chuck Jones (Duke Nukem 3d, Half-Life) and the voice talent of Stephan Weyte (Blood, Fire Emblem, Dusk) in a dark yet distinct medieval fantasy experience. HIGHLIGHTS • Solve puzzles and scour lore to uncover the motives of the foul heretical sects behind the plagues and seasons undermining the land. • Spread fires, charge machinery, reveal hidden paths, and freeze rivers to walk across. • Discover new weapons and upgrade them at blacksmiths and alchemists to customize your capability. • Expand your horizons by returning to old stomping grounds with new abilities and seeing how far down the chasms go and what powers they hide. • Slay over twenty distinct enemies and three bosses in an ever broadening world across multiple biomes. • Band together with up to 7 friends in hectic cooperative play. • Walk the parallel path, lest you stumble into the recesses of the world and reality becomes only a bitter plaything. If you already own the PS4Â® version of this game, you can get the PS5Â® digital version at no extra cost and you do not need to purchase this product. Owners of a PS4Â® disc copy must insert it into the PS5Â® every time they want to download or play the PS5Â® digital version. PS4Â® game disc owners who buy the PS5Â® Digital Edition disc-free console will not be able to get the PS5Â® version at no extra cost.
Title: GRAVEN

description: Bum Simulator is a sandbox game bursting with inappropriate humor and memorable characters. Apart from day-to-day survival, you can enjoy many unique features. You can throw pigeons at people and watch as the panic ensues. Not fun enough? Upgrade your birds with explosives and let chaos reign. Still not satisfied? Wait until you see the fully upgraded pigeonado skill… Mix alcohol with stuff you found on the ground to create powerful mixtures. Drink them (if you dare) to get a boost, or throw them at your enemies for a devastating effect. Every bum needs a shopping cart of their own. Yours is named Carl and he’s your trusty mobile inventory. Also, he’s your best friend (no, really). You’ll learn to love him - we promise! Mutant sewer rat people from the ’80s? Mentally unstable clown with a hook for a hand? A bored rich man telling you to punch random people on the street? We have them all, and then some! You’ll meet them all while following the insane storyline (yes, this game has an actual story!) Day-to-day survival can be exhausting, so why not take a break and get some shut-eye in a cozy shelter? Conquer, construct, and customize your cardboard bases to your heart’s content. However, remember to build some defenses as the rival bum gang raids are inevitable! Crafting makes your life easier. Collect materials and process them to get upgrades and expansions to your base. Tired of searching for food? Construct pots and plant some vegetables. Need stronger pigeons? Better upgrade that coop. Scavenging for scrap got boring? Recruit other bums to do the dirty work for you. With enough work, you can build a truly self-sustainable bum base! Hear ye, hear ye! Every character in the game is fully voiced. Each line of dialogue oozes emotion and personality, which makes the game's storyline and atmosphere even gross… er… more engrossing!
Title: Bum Simulator

description: Get ready for a heart-pounding, action-packed zombie shooting game set in a Brazilian favela. In "Favela Zombie Shooter," you'll face wave after wave of different zombies and have to survive as long as you can. Gameplay: Wave-Based Survival: Brace yourself for relentless waves of the living dead. You must stand your ground and fight off waves of zombies, each with their own unique behaviors and abilities. Zombie Types: To survive, you'll need to adapt to the different zombie types. Slow-moving zombies lumber towards you, but their sheer numbers can overwhelm. Runners sprint at breakneck speed, making them difficult targets. Scratchers, when close, they attack quickly and inflict serious damage. Heavy zombies are nearly impervious to gunfire and require tactical thinking to bring down. Upgrade System: To stay alive, you'll need better weapons. You can earn money in the game and use it to buy stronger guns to help you survive. Features: - Fun and intense zombie shooting action. - Different types of zombies to fight. - Buy better weapons to survive longer. - Four different maps to survive in. - Realistic graphics and beautiful environments. In "Favela Zombie Shooter," you'll need quick reflexes and powerful weapons to survive the zombie onslaught. Can you make it out alive from the favela filled with zombies?
Title: Favela Zombie Shooter

description: Embark on an epic odyssey to safeguard the future of humanity in "Mars Mayhem:Shooter Simulator Warfare" As the valiant Sergeant Eric, you're entrusted with leading your elite team through 60 harrowing days of relentless warfare against an onslaught of enemies threatening mankind's existence on the Red Planet. In "Mars Mayhem:Shooter Simulator Warfare," the fate of civilization lies in your hands as you navigate a treacherous landscape teeming with danger. Choose wisely from a vast array of customizable suits, each offering unique levels of protection crucial for surviving the relentless barrage of enemy attacks. Arm yourself with a formidable arsenal of 8 powerful weapons, meticulously crafted and upgradeable, to unleash devastation upon your foes and ensure victory in the face of overwhelming odds. But survival on Mars demands more than just brute force—it requires strategic ingenuity and cunning tactics. Employ your tactical prowess to strategically position mines and explosive barrels across the Martian terrain, turning the very environment against your adversaries and paving the way for triumph against insurmountable odds. Immerse yourself in the awe-inspiring realism of "Mars Mayhem:Shooter Simulator Warfare" where cutting-edge graphics transport you to the desolate beauty of the Martian frontier. Every pulse-pounding moment is a testament to your courage and resilience as you forge alliances with skilled allies and engage in heart-stopping battles to secure humanity's future among the stars. Prepare to embark on the ultimate journey of survival and conquest in "Mars Mayhem:Shooter Simulator Warfare" The fate of humanity hangs in the balance, and only you have the power to ensure that mankind's legacy endures on the crimson sands of Mars.
Title: Mars Mayhem:Shooter Simulator Warfare

description: Jump into our latest game and guide a lively frog across a pond. Test your timing and skill as you hop from lily pad to lily pad. Play now and discover how high you can soar!
Title: Frog Jumper

description: Glyphs of Gitzan is a block-sliding puzzle adventure spanning 50 unique stages of increasing complexity. Take the role of a young explorer and navigate levels in top-down pixel art style, pushing stone pillars across tiled floors to align them with rows of glyphs. Glowing symbols on each pillar hint at the direction its light will emanate. If you can light up all the glyphs with the pillars in each hall, you’ll be able to proceed to the next tricky chamber. Can you unlock all the secrets of Gitzan? Features: • Take the role of an explorer and solve environmental puzzles in the mysterious ruins! • Push stone pillars to align them with rows of glowing glyphs. • Master 50 unique stages as you delve deeper! • Take on brainteasing challenges that grow increasingly complex. • Enjoy top-down retro pixel art presentation and an atmospheric soundtrack! This product entitles you to download both the digital PS4Â® version and the digital PS5Â® version of this game.
Title: Glyphs of Gitzan

description: Get ready to put your parking skills to the ultimate test in Police Car Parking 3D! This thrilling 3D parking simulation game lets you step into the shoes of a police officer tasked with parking a variety of police cars in challenging scenarios. Navigate through increasingly difficult levels, each designed to test your precision and timing. Gameplay Overview: In Police Car Parking 3D, players must expertly maneuver police cars into designated parking spots within a set time limit. Each level presents unique obstacles and tighter spaces, pushing your driving skills to the limit. As you progress and successfully complete levels, you'll earn money based on your performance. Key Features: Realistic 3D Environments: Experience detailed and immersive parking scenarios with realistic graphics. Progressive Difficulty: Levels become more challenging as you advance, requiring more precision and skill. Earn and Upgrade: Earn money with each completed level and use your earnings to purchase better, faster, and more agile police cars. Variety of Vehicles: Unlock and drive a range of police vehicles, each with unique handling characteristics. Intuitive Controls: Enjoy easy-to-learn controls that offer a realistic driving experience. Story/Setting: Take on the role of a dedicated police officer assigned to park various police vehicles in complex urban environments. Each level simulates different parts of the city, from crowded streets to narrow alleys, ensuring that every parking task is a new adventure. Unique Selling Points: Challenging Gameplay: A game that keeps you engaged with progressively challenging levels. Realistic Simulation: High-quality 3D graphics and realistic physics make for an immersive parking experience. Vehicle Customization: Use your hard-earned money to upgrade your fleet of police cars, enhancing both performance and appearance. Inspiration: Inspired by classic parking simulation games, Police Car Parking 3D brings a unique twist by incorporating the excitement and responsibility of handling police vehicles. Fans of simulation and driving games will find endless hours of fun and challenge.
Title: Police Car Parking 3D

description: Save by purchasing this bundle including Synth Riders and the latest DLC to the game! - If you already own Synth Riders, go directly to the 80s Mixtape - Side A to add the songs to your library! 80s Mixtape - Side A brings together some of our favorites from a time where the only things bigger than the hair were the hits! We built this sensational compilation on five original chart-toppers from the New Wave decade which is such an inspiration for the neon immersive worlds of Synth Riders. 80s Mixtape - Side A Track List: “Take on Me” - a-ha “We Built this City” - Starship “Whip It” - Devo “Sussudio” - Phil Collins “New Sensation” - INXS a-ha, Devo, Phil Collins, Starship and INXS. Get ready to sing and dance to these songs, immersed for the first time in the ‘80s vibe of Synth Riders’ retrofuture environments!
Title: Synth Riders + 80s Mixtape - Side A

description: Football 2024 Journey is an engaging card-matching game centered around the exciting world of football. Flip football-themed cards to find matching pairs. The game features four difficulty levels: Easy, Medium, Hard, and Expert. Each level provides a unique challenge, testing players' memory and concentration. Football 2024 Journey, with its diverse difficulty settings, adds an extra layer of fun to your football-themed gaming experience!
Title: Football 2024 Journey
Publisher: ERIK GAMES YAZILIM OYUN TEKNOLOJILERI TICARET ANONIM SIRKETI

description: The explosive fusion of streetball, racing and rooftop jumping! Jump on the trampolines to feel the real speed and overtake all your opponents. Find the fastest way to the finish line and show off your best dunk!
Title: Sky Dunk

description: The explosive fusion of streetball, racing and rooftop jumping! Jump on the trampolines to feel the real speed and overtake all your opponents. Find the fastest way to the finish line and show off your best dunk!
Title: Sky Dunk

description: Spin the Book offers a serene and meditative escape, inviting players to embark on a journey of relaxation. With a focus on simplicity and peaceful interactions, this game is designed for individuals of all ages who seek a moment of tranquility after a hectic day. Spin and unwind – "Spin the Book" is your ticket to a peaceful and rejuvenating gaming experience. Find your calm, one rotation at a time.
Title: Spin the Book

description: The sight of giant swords blazing through the night sky might be hair-raising, but stand your ground! The sinister Ravenous and his legions of brutal demons are poised for battle. Even all the armies of the world can’t stop them, but humanity has one final ace in the hole: cutting-edge power armor called Paladin. It's now up to a strong-willed android named Flame to become a Squire, pilot the Paladin and track down all Weapon Keepers and their diabolical leader. The showdown between mankind’s technological prowess and the powerful forces of the occult has begun! Seize weapons from the denizens of the Netherworld and give them a taste of their own medicine! Show them the power of cutting-edge technology fused with masterful swordplay. Slash, bash and thrust your way through a series of mind-blowing levels around the world, all of it rendered in glorious 8-bit graphics! Hop in your Paladin and take up arms!
Title: Panzer Paladin

description: Meow meow meow mes amis! Cats, kittens, kitties and other fuzzballs are hidden all around the Parisian landscape, each waiting to be found! Take a relaxing stroll around Paris – every cat you spot brings its unique splash of colour into the scenery, and finding them all will fill the city with life! Features: - A huge Parisian landscape to find cats on; - Two game modes, one harder than the other; - Special unlockable places… filled with kittens! ^.^ - A relaxing atmosphere that anyone can enjoy!
Title: Hidden Cats in Paris

description: Meow meow meow mes amis! Cats, kittens, kitties and other fuzzballs are hidden all around the Parisian landscape, each waiting to be found! Take a relaxing stroll around Paris – every cat you spot brings its unique splash of colour into the scenery, and finding them all will fill the city with life! Features: - A huge Parisian landscape to find cats on; - Two game modes, one harder than the other; - Special unlockable places… filled with kittens! ^.^ - A relaxing atmosphere that anyone can enjoy!
Title: Hidden Cats in Paris

description: Explore V Rising with the Legacy of Castlevania Premium Pack, a collaboration with Konami Digital Entertainment (KONAMI). This pack includes new cosmetics that allow you to build your own imposing Castlevania-style palace, take on the storied aesthetics of hair, clothing, and shapeshifting forms from one of the all-time classic Vampire franchises. Invoke style and indulge in your Castlevania nostalgia alongside the action-packed V Rising experience you’ve come to know and love. This pack includes: V Rising: Full access to the action-packed vampire survival game V Rising on the Playstation 5. The Legacy of Castlevania Premium Pack: The Legacy of Castlevania cosmetic DLC pack introduces a wide range of character customization and castle decorations inspired by the iconic Castlevania characters and art style. The Legacy of Castlevania Premium Pack Contains… 5 Unique Armor Pieces With Alucard’s Regalia The complete set can be crafted in-game when you unlock the tailor bench. It costs cloth and coarse thread to make and is purely cosmetic. Using the new armor customization feature, you can don the garb of the Vampire Prince at any level of your Vampire journey. 3 Unique Shapeshifting Form Variants Traverse the open world with the Soul of the Wolf, embody the prodigal Maria Renard to move unnoticed among the realms of man, or spring through the air as the mischievous Flea Man! Wall-to-Wall Castlevania Ambience Drape your walls, floors, and most valued places of power in the style of Castlevania. Adorn your walls with the sweeping iconography of pristine angelic figures juxtaposed with the bared fangs of the evolved beast of the night wrapped around the head of your bejeweled coffin. Sit on a throne that projects power, shadowed only by the great bat wings cresting each side of its towering frame. Line Your Halls With Figures of Greatness Surround yourself with the imagery of regal creatures of the night, stunning heroes, and the hopeless duality of angelic beauty. One Bespoke Undead Mount Ride into battle upon Rowdain's famed skeletal steed and enjoy the delicious irony of bringing your unliving fantasy to life. Unlock Castlevania Music Tracks Set the tone in your ominous abode with two classic Castlevania themes, “Simon’s Theme” and “Bloody Tears”, reimagined by V Rising composer Aleksandria Migova. This DLC unlocks the music to be played with the Music Box in your castle. Note: These items are unlocked as equivalent tiers of items are made available. For instance, you will gain access to the Soul of the Wolf variant after defeating the Alpha Wolf and unlocking Wolf Form.
Title: V Rising Legacy of Castlevania Edition

description: Welcome to Grand Prix Racing Universal: where the spirit of rally racing meets the pursuit of Grand Prix glory on a variety of thrilling circuits! Prepare to immerse yourself in the ultimate console racing experience, where every curve, every straightaway, and every overtaking opportunity will test your skills to the limit. Dynamic Racing Action: Strap into high-performance rally cars or rugged pickup and unleash their power on a diverse range of challenging circuits purpose-built for adrenaline-fueled competition. You'll have to compete in 12 vehicules races on 3 levels of difficulty. Single Player or Local Multiplayer: Choose your preferred mode of play and embark on a quest for Grand Prix glory in single-player mode, or challenge a friend in local 2-player mode. With split-screen action, the competition heats up as you both aim for victory on the track. Thrilling Grand Prix Challenges: Compete in a series of exhilarating Grand Prix challenges, each set on a variety of circuits where every race is a thrilling test of skill and strategy. Intense Time Trials: Hone your racing skills and master every corner in intense time trial challenges. Race against the clock as you strive to set new track records and prove yourself as the ultimate speed demon. Garage Customization: Earn coins by winning races and use them to enhance your vehicle in the garage section. From performance upgrades to cosmetic enhancements, fine-tune every aspect of your ride to gain the edge on the competition. Stunning Graphics and Realistic Sound: Immerse yourself in the heart-pounding action with stunning graphics that bring each circuit to life in vivid detail. From the roar of the engines to the screech of tires, every sound is meticulously crafted to put you in the driver's seat. Get ready to rev your engines and chase Grand Prix glory in Grand Prix Racing Universal. Are you ready to conquer a variety of thrilling circuits and etch your name in motorsport history?
Title: Grand Prix Racing Universal
Publisher: Benoit Varasse trading as Pix Arts

description: Slime Rancher 2 is a sequel to the award-winning, smash-hit original that has been enjoyed by over 15 million fans worldwide. Continue the adventures of Beatrix LeBeau as she journeys to Rainbow Island, a mysterious land brimming with ancient technology, unknown natural resources, and an avalanche of wiggling, jiggling, new slimes to discover. As Beatrix attempts to unravel the island’s secrets and uncover its true purpose, she’ll build, ranch, and farm within a beautiful conservatory, whose sparkling glass walls give her full view of the prismatic paradise she now calls home. Features: Explore a Vibrant New World Continue the slime ranching adventures of Beatrix LeBeau as she journeys to a mysterious rainbow-hued island. Discover Wiggly New Slimes Collect slimes never seen before on the Far, Far Range, like the bouncy cotton slime or the aquatic angler slime. Build a Conservatory on Rainbow Island Earn newbucks from slime plorts and collect resources on Rainbow Island to upgrade your vacpack, build new gadgets, and expand your conservatory. All purchases include a PlayStationÂ®5-exclusive Slime Toy that can be used in game! This game is currently in early access. This means that it still under development with features (including PlayStation Trophies) to be added at full launch at a later date.
Title: Slime Rancher 2

description: First developed by Monomi Park in 2016, Slime Rancher is a charming, award-winning, multi-million selling, sandbox adventure that will transport you into the immersive world of Rainbow Island. About Slime Rancher Slime Rancher is the tale of Beatrix LeBeau, a plucky, young rancher who sets out for a life a thousand light years away from Earth on the ‘Far, Far Range’ where she tries her hand at making a living of wrangling slimes. About Slime Rancher 2 Continue the adventures of Beatrix LeBeau as she journeys across the Slime Sea to Rainbow Island, a land brimming with ancient mysteries, and bursting with wiggly, new slimes to wrangle in this sequel to the smash-hit, Slime Rancher. Product Features Explore Vibrant New Worlds Collect Wiggly New Slimes Build Gadgets and Expand your Ranch Unravel Hidden Secrets
Title: Slime Rancher Rainbow Bundle

description: Footage style first person game where you are a journalist who returns to his country in search of answers about the death of his mother. This investigation will lead him to discover his origin in a place far from the world where terror lurks. Main features: -Use of camera in photo and video mode with different uses. -Use of lighter and inventory. -Dark narrative in a hostile environment.
Title: POMBERO: The Lord of the Night

description: BroodStar is a classic arcade shoot’em up with heavy roguelike elements. Careful, though… the vastness of space contains many formidable enemies. If you fall along the way, you have to start over — the only thing you’ll bring with you are the upgrade modules you collected in your past runs, in the form of research points that augment your ship. Will they be enough to get you through hordes of unknown creatures and monstrous bosses, and fulfill your quest of defeating the living planet — the BroodStar? Features ãƒ»12 Procedurally Generated Levels with Random Enemies, Events and Bosses ãƒ»Challenges and Leaderboards ãƒ»7 Main and 6 Sub Weapon Types ãƒ»200 Unique Upgrades ãƒ»Research System ãƒ»Seed System ãƒ»Challenging Bosses and Boss Variations ãƒ»Stage Modifiers and Events
Title: BroodStar

description: Father's Day Journey is a delightful puzzle game designed to celebrate the enchanting atmosphere of Father's Day. Flip Father's Day themed cards to uncover matching pairs. The game offers four different difficulty levels: Easy, Medium, Hard, and Expert. Each level challenges players' memory and attention skills. Father's Day Journey, with its four distinct difficulty levels, adds an extra layer of joy to your Father's Day celebrations!
Title: Father's Day Journey
Publisher: ERIK GAMES YAZILIM OYUN TEKNOLOJILERI TICARET ANONIM SIRKETI

description: That's no bubblegum army, that's an endless horde of menacingly pink aliens taking over our planet! Enough sweet talk, grab your gear, we need you and your squad to defeat the pink pests!
Title: From Space Resistance Bundle

description: Embark on an adrenaline-pumping adventure with Offroad Jeep Driving! This immersive 3D game challenges you to navigate through rugged terrains and complete a variety of offroad tasks. Each level presents new obstacles and missions that will test your driving skills and determination. Game Features: Challenging Levels: Tackle a series of levels, each designed with unique offroad challenges that push your driving abilities to the limit. Earn and Upgrade: Successfully complete tasks to earn money. Use your earnings to purchase better jeeps and powerful upgrades, enhancing your offroad capabilities. Realistic 3D Graphics: Experience the thrill of offroad driving with stunning, lifelike 3D graphics that make every rock, hill, and mud puddle come to life. Diverse Terrains: Drive through diverse and treacherous terrains, from rocky mountain paths to muddy forest trails. Dynamic Weather: Face changing weather conditions that add an extra layer of challenge to your offroad adventures. Customizable Controls: Enjoy smooth and intuitive controls that you can customize to suit your driving style. Whether you're a seasoned offroad enthusiast or a newcomer to the genre, Offroad Jeep Driving offers endless excitement and challenges. Master the art of offroad driving, upgrade your jeeps, and conquer every level to become the ultimate offroad champion!
Title: Offroad Jeep Driving

description: Are you ready to start your KUNG FU FITNESS journey today? With a focused mind and a strong body, embark on the challenge to become the greatest Kung Fu master of all time! Join Crazy Kung Fu to start your training, improve your reflexes, get fit, and become the ultimate Kung Fu force! It won’t be easy, so keep your wits about you! As you climb the ranks and master new techniques, you’ll face increasingly difficult challenges that will push you to your limits—and help you discover new limits you didn’t know you had! You’ll grow stronger and healthier, move on instinct, and anticipate the action ahead of time—you’ll be unstoppable! KEY FEATURES • Multiplayer: compete with other players worldwide! • Use your hands and body to engage in unique reflex-based gameplay that will get your heart rate up and teach you new skills. • Embark across 72 levels and 4 game modes, with high-level challenges and gameplay modifiers. • See how well you performed after each level, with statistics on your range and accuracy, as well as your punch, dodge, and block counts. Target your weaknesses to push towards victory! • Train in 6 stunning environments, including your own dojo and a tranquil bamboo forest, each with their own original and immersive soundtracks! • Unlock new locations, bracers, achievements, and challenges. • Challenge your friends and watch yourself climb up the live leaderboards as you play.
Title: Crazy Kung Fu
Publisher: Shanghai Ying Lu Keji Youxian Gongsi

Prepare to immerse yourself in the ultimate console racing experience, where every curve, every straightaway, and every overtaking opportunity will test your skills to the limit.
